data.eml:eml: Northernmost record of a poorly known tuskfish, Choerodon margaritiferus (Perciformes: Labridae), from southern Japan, and first description of a female

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Miyamoto, Kei, Nonaka, Ai, Oka, Shin-Ichiro (2015): Northernmost record of a poorly known tuskfish, Choerodon margaritiferus (Perciformes: Labridae), from southern Japan, and first description of a female. Zootaxa 4007 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4007.1.5
